courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for both CHLH 125 and KIN 125.
description: Serves as an introduction to the Kinesiology and Community Health Department and provides an overview of the Kinesiology and Community Health curricula, areas of study, and opportunities available for careers in the field. Enrollment required for Community Health freshmen and transfer students. Credit is not given for both CHLH 125 and KIN 125.
label: Orientation KIN & Comm Health
